price: Na εnyε ͻdwomtoni asεm. Mo gyidie a εwͻ mu no sua.
arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā huwa biqawli shāʿirin qalīlan mā tu'minūna
